description:
During the 21st century, humanity attempted to colonize Mars by sending two species which could endure the harsh environment of the planet to terraform it—algae and cockroaches. However, they did not anticipate the species' remarkable ability to adapt. Now in the 26th century, a lethal disease known as the Alien Engine Virus has arrived on Earth, and the cure is suspected to be found only on Mars. The problem is, Mars in the present is overrun by creatures known as "Terraformars," incredibly powerful and intelligent humanoid cockroaches that mutated from those originally sent to the planet.

The Annex I team, consisting of a hundred men and women genetically enhanced with characteristics of powerful organisms from earth, has been sent to Mars on a mission to find the cause of the Alien Engine Virus and to help cure humanity—signalling the start of the crew's fight for survival.

tags.name: Tragedy
tags.description: Centers around tragic events and unhappy endings.

tags.name: Super Power
tags.description: Prominently features characters with special abilities that allow them to do what would normally be physically or logically impossible.

tags.name: Gore
tags.description: Prominently features graphic bloodshed and violence.

tags.name: Henshin
tags.description: Prominently features character or costume transformations which often grant special abilities.

tags.name: Survival
tags.description: Centers around the struggle to live in spite of extreme obstacles.

tags.name: Animals
tags.description: Prominently features animal characters in a leading role.

tags.name: War
tags.description: Partly or completely set during wartime.

tags.name: Body Horror
tags.description: Features characters who undergo horrific transformations or disfigurement, often to their own detriment.

tags.name: Space
tags.description: Partly or completely set in outer space.

tags.name: Primarily Adult Cast
tags.description: Main cast is mostly composed of characters above a high school age.

tags.name: Ensemble Cast
tags.description: Features a large cast of characters with (almost) equal screen time and importance to the plot.

node.description:
__[Website](http://shogo.strikes.jp/)__ | __[Twitter](https://twitter.com/shogoy)__

__Shougo Yasukawa__ is a Japanese script/screenwriter, series composer and lyricist.

He works for Warner Entertainment Japan. Previously a long-time employee of Geneon Universal, being a part of the company since Geneon was still known as Pioneer LDC. Note: Not to be confused with the CG animator Akihiro Kawamura (川村晃弘)
**Satoshi Adachi** is a Japanese producer and animation planner.

**[Twitter](https://twitter.com/akitakanori)**

**Aki Takanori (安藝貴範)** is a Japanese producer and animation planner.
_Note: Not to be confused with the [animator](https://anilist.co/staff/216048/)._
He is also proficient in animation and computer graphics.
